name: As seen on The Bachelorette - Desiree Hartsock -  Solid Bronze wax seal necklace by Ritzy Misfit
description:
Ritzy Misfit's Pure Bronze wax seal stamped monogram necklace was worn by Desiree Hartsock on ABC's The Bachelorette this season! She wore this piece on her one on one date with Drew.

This listing is for a necklace just like the one she is wearing. It looks like gold, but is pure bronze.

You pick the monogrammed letter you'd like. 

Please let us know which letter you'd like in PAYPAL while checking out, or email us at ritzymisfit@gmail.com

This necklace comes with a 16" chain. Please email us after ordering if you'd like another length.

Great discounts when ordering multiples of 5 or more are available. Email us at ritzymisfit@gmail.com for details.

Thank you very much!  


- RITZY MISFIT - - 
-The original hand stamped wax seal pendants

*PLEASE READ ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE PURCHASING**


Great for Christmas Gifts, birthday's, baby showers, mothers day, etc! Get one for each of the women you love!

Perfect for Bridesmaids so they can have a uniform look while maintaining their beautiful individuality. 
Give them a heart, or stagger them with an initial too!

*I love mixing metals and wearing copper, silver and bronze together! 

No one is perfect, but we are all beautiful. These pendants give the feeling of being beautiful, unique and rough around the edges at the same time. My work reflects the wonderful, flawed idiosyncrasies in us all. And it makes us breath-taking.

They are each one of a kind pieces of art. No pendant can be replicated.

The personalized initial pendant is my ultimate best seller. It can be made into any letter you choose.

This pendant is made from PURE BRONZE, not wax, and comes on a coordinating 16" chain.

Please indicate the letter you would like in the message to seller in PAYPAL or email to ritzymisfit@gmail.com as well as any other specifications :)

**If we don't receive adequate details about your pendant, we will need to contact you to get the information which may delay the production/arrival of your order.**

Thanks so much and have a wonderful day! 
xx

name: As seen in Beautiful Bride Magazine September 2012 issue! Custom silver toned wax seal necklace
description:
Ritzy Misfit- -
Original Wax seal necklaces

One of a kind, Hand stamped Monogrammed Pendants 
Perfect for both bridesmaids, and the bride herself! As seen in the "fab finds" in September's Beautiful Bride Magazine!

Also great for Christmas Gifts, birthday's, baby showers, mothers day, etc! Buy a multiple listing and get one for each of the women you love!

See other listings for discounts on multiple pieces.

**PLEASE READ ENTIRE LISTING BEFORE PURCHASING**

-The original hand stamped wax seal pendants

No one is perfect, but we are all beautiful. These pendants give the feeling of being beautiful, unique and rough around the edges at the same time. They reflect the wonderful, flawed idiosyncrasies in us all. And it makes us breath-taking.

Ritzy Misfit has recently been seen in/on:

Beautiful Bride Magazine's "Fab Finds" Sept 2012
The Bachelor' on ABC (many pieces)
Texas Women on CMT (many pieces) 
Bachelor Pad, on ABC
The Bachelorette, worn by Jillian and Ali 
Kendra Wilkinson from the girls Next Door
And Jillian Harris on 2009 Bachelorette. (turquoise J) 
There have also been many other unconfirmed sightings on amazing people!


This listing is for a stunningly original pendant; melted and stamped by hand. They are then rubbed, sanded and buffed until at the peak of imperfect perfection!

They are each one of a kind pieces of art. No pendant can be completely replicated.

The personalized initial pendant is my ultimate best seller. It can be made into any letter you choose.

All of our pieces are made of a silver based metal alloy that is lead and nickel free. It is very durable and will not tarnish aside from the patina added purposefully to give the antiqued effect.

This piece is approximately the size of an american quarter. For smaller sizes, see the mini listing as well as copper and bronze.

The “flaws” or “blemishes” or “imperfections” that I adore turn out to have a few degrees of roughness. For me, the rougher the better. Like myself. :)

There are approximately 3 categories of “character”.

****PLEASE READ before purchasing:

CHARACTER:

The first level of character is almost perfect. These are almost completely round, and fairly even around the edges.

The second degree has more character, or flaws (which I personally love) and may be less perfectly round, and a bit more rustic looking.

The third degree has a lot of character, in the way of roughness, (not sharp), inconsistencies, and uneven overflow of metal. Many of these are my ultimate favorites.

***Please indicate IN PAYPAL note to seller during checkout, or via email to ritzymisfit@gmail.com these three things:

1. letter you would like 
2. degree of character 
3. how you heard about us!

Feel free to be as specific as possible. I’ll do my best to make one you will LOVE, and the more I know, the closer I’ll be!

**If we don't receive adequate details about your pendant at the time of purchase, we will need to contact you to get the information which may delay the production/arrival of your order.**

Please allow up to TWO WEEKS before items are shipped. We are usually ahead of that, but we give ourselves some wiggle room as I make each from scratch AFTER you order. :)

Need it sooner? A RUSH service is available; contact us for cost and details.

Thanks so much, and have a wonderful day!
xx

CHARACTER:

The first level of character is almost perfect. These are almost completely round, and fairly even around the edges.

The second degree has more character, or flaws (which I personally love) and may be less perfectly round, and a bit more rustic looking.

The third degree has a lot of character, in the way of roughness, (not sharp), inconsistencies, and uneven overflow of metal. Many of these are my ultimate favorites.
